ResumePage.Quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power
ResumePage.AboutMeDescription: Hello, I'm Furkan. I have been involved with technology from a young age and have a strong ability to adapt to modern technologies easily. I am proficient in technological infrastructure, computer hardware, and web development. Through various projects, I have gained experience that has helped me improve my problem-solving and analytical skills. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects in the technology field, fostering both my personal and professional growth.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hello, I'm Furkan. I have been involved with technology from a young age and have a strong ability to adapt to modern technologies easily. I am proficient in technological infrastructure, computer hardware, and web development. Through various projects, I have gained experience that has helped me improve my problem-solving and analytical skills. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects in the technology field, fostering both my personal and professional growth.

ProjectsPage.githubButtonAriaLabel: View source code for {title} on GitHub

getitdone.title: Get It Done
getitdone.description: Get It Done is a simple todo list app that helps you get things done. It is built with React and Redux.

rplace.title: r/place clone
rplace.description: A clone of Reddit's r/place project. Users can draw on a canvas with a color of their choice. The project is built with React and Firebase.

PGenerator.title: Smart Password Generator
PGenerator.description: A smart password generator that generates strong passwords based on user input. The project is built with React.

Resume3.title: Resume3
Resume3.description: An application that allows users to create their resumes through artificial intelligence.
